DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 120 qualified patient medical center , diagnose mild moderate chronic kidney disease ( estimate GFR 15-60 ml/min ) , enrol . After informed consent , qualified subject randomize 3 arm 1:1:1 ratio : lanthanum carbonate , calcium acetate , dietary modification . The maximum length treatment 12 month . Dose intervention adjust base change biochemical parameter . Primary end point change serum phosphorus , urine phosphorus , serum parathyroid hormone , coronary artery calcification , aortic pulse velocity flow mediate vasodilation .
